attributes.action: Stop Alton towers taking too many people into the park causing que big que times
attributes.additional_details: Because I feel that the are just money grabbing and not providing the services I’ve paid for
attributes.background: Stop Merlin entertainments over booking on a daily basis

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about how many people to let into entertainment venues are a matter for individual venues, not the UK Government or Parliament.
